summary: Add support for workflow updates in the PHP SDK by making the update handler registration interface publicly available, similar to the Go SDK implementation.
userImpact: PHP developers cannot implement workflow updates without access to internal update handler registration interfaces.
rootCause: Update handler registration interface is internal/private and not exposed for public use in PHP SDK.
proposedFix: Make the update handler registration interface publicly available in the PHP SDK, matching the Go SDK's approach of exposing internal interfaces.
resolutionDetails: Update handler interface was made public in PHP SDK to support workflow updates.
keyQuote: we need this interface to be publicly available to register the handler
